SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT USER.ID FROM AC_USER_ACCT USER LEFT JOIN AC_USER_ROLE_ASSIGN ASN ON USER.ID = ASN.USER_ACCT_ID LEFT JOIN AC_ROLE ROLE ON ASN.ROLE_ID = ROLE.ID LEFT JOIN PJT_USER_PROJECT_ASN PSN ON PSN.USER_ACCT_ID = USER.ID LEFT JOIN PJT_PROJECT PJT ON PJT.ID = PSN.PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN PJT_PROJECT_GROUP GRP ON PJT.GROUP_ID = GRP.ID
AND UPPER(LOGIN_ID) LIKE CONCAT ('%', UPPER(#{sp.params.loginId}), '%')
AND UPPER(EMAIL) LIKE CONCAT ('%', UPPER(#{sp.params.email}), '%')
AND ROLE.ID = #{sp.params.roleParam}
AND PJT.ID = #{sp.params.project}
AND PSN.GROUP_ID IN (SELECT GROUP_ID FROM PJT_USER_PROJECT_ASN WHERE USER_ACCT_ID = #{sp.params.userId})
AND ASN.ROLE_ID = 'DEV'
AND ASN.ROLE_ID = 'QA'
GROUP BY USER.ID) AS T

SELECT USER.ID, USER.NAME, USER.LOGIN_ID, USER.LAST_LOGIN_SUCCESS_DT AS LAST_LOGIN_AT, USER.EMAIL, ROLE.ROLE_NAME, ROLE.ID AS ROLE_ID, USER.STATUS, CASE USER.STATUS WHEN 'A' THEN '正常' WHEN 'L' THEN '已锁定' WHEN 'I' THEN '未激活' WHEN 'E' THEN '已过期' WHEN 'V' THEN '已注销' END AS STATUS_DESC, DATE_FORMAT(USER.ACTIVATED_AT, '%Y/%m/%d') AS ACTIVATED_AT, DATE_FORMAT(USER.DEACTIVATED_AT, '%Y/%m/%d') AS DEACTIVATED_AT FROM AC_USER_ACCT USER LEFT JOIN AC_USER_ROLE_ASSIGN ASN ON USER.ID = ASN.USER_ACCT_ID LEFT JOIN AC_ROLE ROLE ON ASN.ROLE_ID = ROLE.ID WHERE USER.ID = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT USER.* FROM AC_USER_ACCT USER LEFT JOIN PJT_USER_PROJECT_ASN PSN ON PSN.USER_ACCT_ID = USER.ID WHERE PSN.GROUP_ID IN (SELECT GROUP_ID FROM PJT_USER_PROJECT_ASN WHERE USER_ACCT_ID = #{supervisorId})

SELECT DISTINCT USER.* FROM AC_USER_ACCT USER LEFT JOIN AC_USER_ROLE_ASSIGN ROLE ON USER.ID = ROLE.USER_ACCT_ID LEFT JOIN PJT_USER_PROJECT_ASN PSN ON USER.ID = PSN.USER_ACCT_ID
AND ROLE.ROLE_ID = #{param2} AND PSN.GROUP_ID = #{param1}
